songs.title: GoodEnough!
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Keyon Christ]
Who the fuck are you?
You're so fucking loud
You acting a fool, I can tell you don't get out
Come and fuck with us, we'll show you that Toronto love
Baby, we could use you in our section, wassup?

[Pre-Chorus: Rio]
(Ooh)
Girl, I know you know I know
You don't do this all the time, although you creeping on the low
It's bittersweet like lemon-lime
Girl, I know you know I know
What you do in your own time
I'm not judging that at all
You're a star in here tonight, that's why you're –

[Chorus: Rio]
Good enough, good enough, good enough for me
And I promise you, once you kick it, you won't ever leave
'Cause you're good enough, good enough for me, for me
Good enough, good enough for me, for me
For me (Ooh), for me
Good enough for, good enough for
For me (Ooh), good enough for me
Good enough for me

[Verse 2: Keyon Christ]
Who the fuck are you?
You're so fucking bad
Got one question for you, you mix Henny with your tabs?
I haven't been sober in about a week or more
If you want to smoke I got the Backwoods for sure

[Pre-Chorus: Rio]
(Ooh)
Girl, I know you know I know
You don't do this all the time, although you creeping on the low
It's bittersweet like lemon-lime
Girl, I know you know I know
What you do in your own time
I'm not judging that at all
You're a star in here tonight, that's why you're –

[Chorus: Rio]
Good enough, good enough, good enough for me
And I promise you, once you kick it, you won't ever leave
'Cause you're good enough, good enough for me, for me
Good enough, good enough for me, for me
For me (Ooh), for me
Good enough for, good enough for
For me (Ooh), good enough for me
Good enough for me
